topic.title: Physical Hardware
topic.shortdesc: This page allows you to view and provision bare metal servers that are not managed by HPE OneView.

ul.li: The search bar allows you to filter the hardware you want to view. Additionally, you can filter by typing in text similar to searching by keywords.
You can sort using the column headers in the table.
View and provision bare metal servers that are not managed by HPE OneView by installing an HPE Linux or RHEL KVM operating system. You can then activate the servers as compute hosts.
